title: Bounce.2000.DVDRip.DivX.MP3
description:
Title: Bounce
release: DvDRip
Year: 2000
Runtime: 106 min
Country: USA
Language: English

Video: DivX 3 640x352 23.98fps 747Kbps
Audio: MPEG Audio Layer 3 44100Hz stereo 128Kbps

Buddy Amaral, a successful and self-absorbed Los Angeles advertising executive, switches airline tickets with a stranger just before boarding a long-delayed flight so that he might enjoy an overnight fling with a pretty Dallas businesswoman. When the plane goes down, killing all aboard, Buddy's guilt soon turns into an alcohol problem, As part of his 12-step program, Buddy seeks atonement and decides to seek out the woman he thinks he's left a widow. When he finds Abby Janello, a beautiful and smart real estate agent and mother of two, the pair fall in love, only to later split when she learns the truth.

Starring: Gwyneth Paltrow, Ben Affleck, Jennifer Grey, Tony Goldwyn, Natasha Henstridge, Edward Edwards, Lisa Carpenter Prewitt, Lisa Joyner, Richard Saxton, Caroline Aaron

Director: Donald Roos
